ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject

Class SensorData

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.SensorData

  • public class SensorData
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles processing the sensor data and facilitates access to it.
    Author:
    Josh Inscoe

      • lightLevelHandler

        public void lightLevelHandler(float value,
                     int sel)
        Handler method to be called by a LightPoller object.
        Parameters:
        value - the latest data value returned by the light sensor

      • ultrasonicHandler

        public void ultrasonicHandler(float value)
        Handler method to be called by an UltrasonicPoller object.
        Parameters:
        value - the latest data value returned by the ultrasonic sensor

      • getLLRefs

        public int getLLRefs()
        Get the number of external objects which access the light sensor data.
        Returns:
        the number of external objects which use the light sensor data provided by this object

        Returns:

      • getLLDataLatest

        public float getLLDataLatest(int sel)
        Get the latest data value polled from the light sensor.
        Parameters:
        sel - the light sensor you want to get data from (1 = left, 2 = right, 3 = middle)
        Returns:
        the latest light sensor data value

      • getLLStats

        public float[] getLLStats()
        Get the moving statistics of the light sensor data.
        Returns:
